Package io.avaje.jsonb.jackson

Class JacksonAdapter

java.lang.Object
io.avaje.jsonb.jackson.JacksonAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOAdapter
public class JacksonAdapter extends Object implements IOAdapter
Jackson Core implementation of IOAdapter.

  • Method Details

    • properties

      public PropertyNames properties(String... names)
      Description copied from interface: IOAdapter
      Return PropertyNames given the names of properties.

      The PropertyNames can prepare the names for writing such as escaping quotes and encoding to bytes so that the names can be written more efficiently.

      Specified by:
      properties in interface IOAdapter
      See Also:
      • JsonWriter.names(PropertyNames)
      • JsonWriter.name(int)
